attributes.action: Ban discrimination of Age in the Media industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the new world is ever more competitive than the world five years ago, it is harder for younger people of the modern society to create oppotunities for themselves.  I have noticed that many film/television companies refuse to take on persons below the age of 18 for work experience placements.  I wish that such policies from company is to be band, and regardless of age, you can have a fair chance when applying for positions.
